plays.text: Goal scored by Anson Carter assisted by Mike Comrie and Shawn Horcoff
Penalty to Georges Laraque 2 minutes for High Sticking Kirk Maltby
Goal scored by Boyd Devereaux assisted by Nicklas Lidstrom and Steve Yzerman
Penalty to Steve Staios 2 minutes for Slashing Kirk Maltby
Penalty to Luc Robitaille 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Steve Staios
Penalty to Mathieu Dandenault 2 minutes for Holding Rem Murray
Penalty to Domenic Pittis 2 minutes for High Sticking Kris Draper
Penalty to Eric Brewer 2 minutes for Crosschecking Tomas Holmstrom
Goal scored by Steve Yzerman assisted by Chris Chelios and Boyd Devereaux
Penalty to Sergei Fedorov 2 minutes for Boarding Domenic Pittis
Penalty to Chris Chelios 2 minutes for High Sticking(opposing player not identified)
